argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_equsb1 | |- [ y / x ] x = y |
| 2 |  | #P_sban | |- ( [ y / x ] ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ( [ y / x ] x = y /\ [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simplbi2com | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> ( [ y / x ] x = y -> [ y / x ] ( x = y /\ ph ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_mpi | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> [ y / x ] ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_spsbe | |- ( [ y / x ] ( x = y /\ ph ) -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_hbs1 | |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. x [ y / x ] ph ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ph ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ph ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> x = y ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> x = y ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_sbequ1 | |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_com12 | |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 11, 13 | #P_syl6c | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_exlimexi | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> [ y / x ] ph ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_impbii | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
\
 Equivalence for substitution.  Alternate proof of ~ sb5 .  This proof is ~ sb5ALTVD automatically translated and minimized.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2013.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
